overview: Stars: Patrick Tango Hunter (VH1's, "I Love New York"). 35 year old Horace moves from Brooklyn to Queens in order to leave his wild past. He meets wonderful, loving, Mia and tries to become a law abiding person. Unfortunately, a thug from the past threatens his life. He must not only keep his past from Mia, but he must also save her life.
title: The Final Straw
